snippet.textDisplay: im a huge fan of johnny depp and was so sad about the entire abuse thing. There wasn't really any evidence that I could find of his abuse being true but people are so fast to conclusions and the internet and a lot of my old friends (mainly my facebook social justice warrior friends) were saying horrible things about him and the people who support him. I didn't want to support a predator and did want to believe her, but it just seemed so unfair on his side. I'm so glad its starting to clear up for him. We still don't know the whole story, but please don't jump to conclusions until the facts are out☹️
snippet.textOriginal: im a huge fan of johnny depp and was so sad about the entire abuse thing. snippet.textDisplay:
I just signed the petition. I, for one, can admit that I fell into the trap of believing some of the allegations but her conversation does not sound like someone who was abused.

I was expecting to hear “can you promise to stop abusing me as well?” from someone who is being abused or “why do you not account for when you hit me”? Instead she taunts that her so called abuser decides to leave instead of engage further in physical altercation.

No one can confirm what really happened during the entirety of their relationship but her reaction to the video and the double standard her lawyer is using is truly unprofessional and appalling
snippet.textOriginal:
I just signed the petition. I, for one, can admit that I fell into the trap of believing some of the allegations but her conversation does not sound like someone who was abused. 

I was expecting to hear “can you promise to stop abusing me as well?” from someone who is being abused or “why do you not account for when you hit me”? Instead she taunts that her so called abuser decides to leave instead of engage further in physical altercation. 

No one can confirm what really happened during the entirety of their relationship but her reaction to the video and the double standard her lawyer is using is truly unprofessional and appalling

snippet.textDisplay: My Dad was abused by my Step Mom for years and my sister and i was abused by her too, and everytime we would call the cops on her she would manipulate them into thinking that my Dad was the abuser, we also went to the police to talk to them and see what we can do and get a restraining order but guess what? They didn't even listen and the abuse kept on going till he finally decided to leave her and go far away from her. Even then she still tried to ruin his life. Women can be abusers too and seeing this just breaks my heart, people like my Dad and Johnny need justice. Hope something changes this time but i doubt it

snippet.textDisplay:
Heard's lawyer should have just kept quiet. Instead she dug herself, and Heard, into an even bigger hole. The audio explicitly shows that Depp wants to avoid physical violence at every turn. When they get shouty, Depp wants to GET AWAY from the fight, not escalate it even further. It's Depp who makes the suggestion that he and Heard seperate if there's any hint of the fight becoming physical and HEARD is the one saying that NOT ONLY DOES SHE NOT WANT TO SEPERATE but ALSO THAT SHE CANNOT GUARANTEE SHE WON'T GET PHYSICAL AGAIN.

It is OBVIOUS even at this stage who the ACTUAL perpetrator really is, and it's become ESPECIALLY apparent with the additional leaked audio where Heard says if Depp would tell other people he's the victim of domestic violence then nobody would believe him. Because, according to Heard, he's a big man and she's a small woman. It's despicable.
snippet.textOriginal:
Heard's lawyer should have just kept quiet. Instead she dug herself, and Heard, into an even bigger hole. The audio explicitly shows that Depp wants to avoid physical violence at every turn. When they get shouty, Depp wants to GET AWAY from the fight, not escalate it even further. It's Depp who makes the suggestion that he and Heard seperate if there's any hint of the fight becoming physical and HEARD is the one saying that NOT ONLY DOES SHE NOT WANT TO SEPERATE but ALSO THAT SHE CANNOT GUARANTEE SHE WON'T GET PHYSICAL AGAIN. 

It is OBVIOUS even at this stage who the ACTUAL perpetrator really is, and it's become ESPECIALLY apparent with the additional leaked audio where Heard says if Depp would tell other people he's the victim of domestic violence then nobody would believe him. Because, according to Heard, he's a big man and she's a small woman. It's despicable.

snippet.textDisplay:
Dear Amber Heard,

You are part of the reason why ACTUAL struggling women and abuse victims are still fighting for equal rights, justice, and etc. Please do all of us a favor and either get yourself some SERIOUS HELP or stop talking altogether if this is merely another famous person's ruse to be representational and sensational in the public eye. (Though, pretty sure you need some help.)
Thanks.

- From an actual person who has experienced first-hand abuse and kept quiet for years, got some help, and now is at peace and trying to help others through bad times

(Sorry to spam your comment section, Phil. But once in a while, a public journal entry feels good to the individual writing it. lol)
snippet.textOriginal:
Dear Amber Heard,

You are part of the reason why ACTUAL struggling women and abuse victims are still fighting for equal rights, justice, and etc.  Please do all of us a favor and either get yourself some SERIOUS HELP or stop talking altogether if this is merely another famous person's ruse to be representational and sensational in the public eye.  (Though, pretty sure you need some help.)
Thanks.

- From an actual person who has experienced first-hand abuse and kept quiet for years, got some help, and now is at peace and trying to help others through bad times

snippet.textDisplay: Never believed that Depp was abusive. Also, none of his other ex-wives ever said anything like that, in fact they've come out with statements telling that Depp was never abusive in any way. And suddenly Amber Heard comes out of the blue with some wild accusations? But obviously society is screwed up and for men there's never justice, and every sucker out there falls for a woman playing a "poor victim". I know personally 4 men who are also victims like that, couple of them are big men like mountain who could literally smear the women who abuse them with a single slap all over the room. But none of them does, none of them is violent and sadly, none of them has left their abusive relationship, because they still love that monster and hope that perhaps, one day, she'll change. And none of them has ever come out and talked to others about it (I myself found it out by random chance), because society would ridicule them and not take their claim seriously. Bah, hope Heard and others like her burn...

snippet.textDisplay: Yes, the audio doesn't necessarily disprove that Johnny Depp has physically abused Amber. But it does have Amber admitting that she started physical fights with him many times, while Depp would continuously try to de-escalate these kind of situations by calling someone to intervene, or getting away from her. And apparently these attempts to de-escalate the situation only made Amber angrier, saying quote: "Just because I've thrown pots and pans does not mean you cannot come and knock on my door."
snippet.textOriginal: Yes, the audio doesn't necessarily disprove that Johnny Depp has physically abused Amber. But it does have Amber admitting that she started physical fights with him many times, while Depp would continuously try to de-escalate these kind of situations by calling someone to intervene, or getting away from her. And apparently these attempts to de-escalate the situation only made Amber angrier, saying quote: "Just because I've thrown pots and pans does not mean you cannot come and knock on my door."

snippet.textDisplay: I don't know how she got sacred "Domestic Abuse Survivors Queen" in the first place. Even in a parallel universe where her claims against Johnny Depp were true, she WAS arrested for domestic violence against her previous girlfriend, Tasya Van Ree back in 2009. So at the time, Amber was not famous and Tasya Van Ree sure ain't Johnny Depp in terms of fame, it doesn't change the fact that she had NO PLACE talking for the victims. And now on top of it all, we discover she was lying all along. I'd call it karma but you know, no matter what, screw everyone who supported her as an "ambassador" against domestic abuse.
snippet.textOriginal: I don't know how she got sacred "Domestic Abuse Survivors Queen" in the first place. snippet.textDisplay:
I agree that the relationship between Depp and Heard COULD have been mutually abusive.
HOWEVER, the language that Heard uses in that recording is NOT cool. I get FLASHBACKS to watching my friends go through abusive relationships where they are manipulated into staying. The language Heard uses is indicative of an abuser trying to keep their victim in the relationship when that person is done being a victim. It’s part of the cycle. The wind up to the honeymoon period.

If amber heard was NOT abused and instead flipped the script on Depp as the abuser, not only does it take away from real FEMALE victims, it makes it so MALE victims will have a hard time getting help. It hurts so many people.

It also indicates a level of guilt on the part of Heard with her donation to the ACLU... or maybe an attempt at covering it up again... who knows.

snippet.textDisplay: My heart shatters for Depp. Admittedly I have not been the biggest fan of Depp because I think his roles have really started blending together, and then the abuse allegations added fuel for that. Upon learning the truth I am completely appalled by the horrific, monstrous, and insane behavior of Amber Heard. I hate so much that Depp's reputation has been damaged, and I hope he can bounce back, better than ever. Mr. Depp, I know you'll never see this, but know this: I will do my part to support your career. Bring on ALL the Fantastic Beasts movies! More Pirates sequels! Hell, let's get an Edward Scissorhands sequel comin!

snippet.textDisplay: I am glad you gave the statistics of death from the flu being .095%. People panic about the flu really don't understand that pretty much most deaths from it are complications from other pre-existing conditions. They also don't understand how many diseases have flu like conditions. Right now in NC there is a respiratory disease that gives flu like condition but isn't the flu. Also wish people would understand differences between different types of viruses. That the flu mutates quickly vs diseases like polio does not. Making vaccine for one is effective the other might (and has) encourage more mutations in the flu.

snippet.textDisplay:
#believewomen has GOT to stop. Not the idea of it - but weaponizing the general publics' outrage for personal gain or furthering legal battles, which both celebrities and non-celebrities alike do.
The Chipotle dine-and-dasher incident in late 2018 is a prime example of why this sort of 'mob mentality' with little to no evidence is crazy.
We're seeing court filings and brief, few second snapshots - this means nothing in the sum total of a relationship that lasted for years.
snippet.textOriginal:
#believewomen has GOT to stop. Not the idea of it - but weaponizing the general publics' outrage for personal gain or furthering legal battles, which both celebrities and non-celebrities alike do.
The Chipotle dine-and-dasher incident in late 2018 is a prime example of why this sort of 'mob mentality' with little to no evidence is crazy. 
We're seeing court filings and brief, few second snapshots - this means nothing in the sum total of a relationship that lasted for years.

snippet.textDisplay: Men can be the victims of domestic abuse too just as how women are. The main factor and difference is the CONTEXT of the situation. Just because she is a woman and he is a man, that should not be the biased reason as to who is immediately guilty and who is the victim. There is a reason as to why EVIDENCE is important to a case because it then degrades to a “he said, she said” scenario without it and then it just boils down to a popularity contest at that point. I wouldn’t judge until all the facts, or better said, the proper evidence is shown to PROVE who is guilty or and who is not.

snippet.textDisplay:
The finger thing gave him 3 staph infections and if you know anything about staph it's not to be taken lightly at all.

The entitlement of this woman would be shocking if I literally didnt hear women act like this on a regular basis.

It's one of the greatest failings of the newest generation to believe people making a claim without evidence in a world where everyone has a video camera in their pockets that can make videos that cant be deleted completely without access to their cloud backup...

#MillenialsAreMorons
